title: Move right in to this terrific 2-bedoom/2-bath ranch
map_address: 19901 Van Aken Boulevard, Unit 2 near Van Aken Boulevard, Unit 2
posting_body: Move right in to this terrific 2-bedoom/2-bath ranch style condo.
Enjoy your Pim’s cup on your covered patio on the edge of the Shaker Heights Country Club golf course.
The unit has been updated with all the conveniences of modern living.
Decorator touches add a sophisticated feeling to the spacious living room with large corner windows and door to the covered patio.
The updated kitchen has quartz countertops and very recent appliances.
The dining room is filled with light.
